attributes.action: LEAVE means LEAVE.  Uphold the democratic rights of the people and BREXIT asap
attributes.additional_details: Time to take back control of our country & respectfully remind the Remainians that they should be thanking us & not jumping up & down whinging about not winning and stating therefore that all people that voted leave are uneducated & racist.  The action of demonising another group is what they are doing in a stereotypical fashion.  They are also acting in a farcical & wholly undemocratic way akin to the unelected bodies that they are asking to be governed by.  LEAVE MEANS LEAVE-GET BEHIND BREXIT
attributes.background: Recent poll asking to have another vote because they didn't win & now say they wanted to lose by more than 1 1/4 million votes.  Wales won against ROI & the ROI are not asking for a rematch because of an own goal made them lose.  The country now needs to get behind BREXIT & be the best we can be
